articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Pyongyang Terrapin Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Pyongyang Terrapin Farm
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Pyongyang Terrapin Farm which was remodeled into an example and standard of the DPRK culture farms.
					 Enjoying with broad smile on his face the panoramic view of the farm, Kim Jong Un said with pleasure that it has been radically changed into an another asset contributable to improving the people's living standard in a matter of one year.
					
					 After watching the mosaic depicting leader Kim Jong Il newly erected in the compound of the farm, he went round the newly-built room for education in the revolutionary history.
					
					 Noting that the People's Army built well the room, he stressed that the farm should effectively conduct the education to let its employees deeply realize the leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il and the party associated with the farm.
					
					 Going round the combined control room, indoor terrapin culture ground, hatchery, geothermal machine room, microbial culture ground and other parts of the farm, he learned in detail about its reconstruction and production.
					
					 An integrated production system ensuring real-time adjustment of the temperature, content of oxygen and pH of water in the breeding grounds and feeding time and enabling the simulation of a variety of production and planning methods was established successfully to put the terrapin breeding on a high scientific and IT basis, he noted.
					
					 Thorough measures were taken to keep the breeding grounds warm by use of geotherm and the process of recycling water through biological filtering was established to turn the farm into an energy-saving, water-saving one, he added.
					
					 Urging the farm to keep the production going at a high rate as it was modernized as intended by the Party, he advanced tasks facing it.
					
					 Noting the farm has been successfully remodeled, he praised the officials, soldier-builders, scientists and technicians for dedicating their creative wisdom, enthusiasm and efforts to the remodeling project.  
					
					 He had a photo taken with the officials and employees of the farm.
					
					 Accompanying him was Jo Yong Won and Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: DPRK Government Denounces U.S., S. Korea's Sophism about "Denuclearization of North"
articles.content:
DPRK Government Denounces U.S., S. Korea's Sophism about "Denuclearization of North"
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The DPRK at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea clarified its policy stand that it will remove the root cause of the threat of nuclear war created by the U.S. and safeguard peace in the region and the rest of the world by means of our powerful nuclear deterrent, it will not use nuclear weapons first, unless the hostile forces violate our sovereignty with their own nuclear weapons, and it will faithfully observe its commitments to nuclear non-proliferation, which it has made before the international community, and strive for global denuclearization.
					 The DPRK has entered the new phase of its drive for implementing the stand.
					
					 But the U.S., the south Korean authorities and other forces hostile toward the DPRK are spinning out sophism that the nuclear weapons of the DPRK are a "threat" to peace of the Korean peninsula and other parts of the world and that no problem can be settled unless the "denuclearization of the north is achieved first", misleading the public opinion at home and abroad.
					
					 The U.S. has declined the DPRK's constructive proposal for replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty under such absurd preconditions as "north's dismantlement of nukes first" and squarely challenged the DPRK's sincere proposals and efforts for dialogue for the improvement of the north-south ties and Korea's reunification with such words as "north's denuclearization first".
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group, in particular, is resorting to all sorts of despicable deeds to solicit cooperation for sanctions and pressure on the DPRK whenever an opportunity presents itself while busily going here and there with the "north's denuclearization first" as a cure-all pretext.
					
					 In a statement on Wednesday a spokesman for the DPRK government denounced this as a foolish act of totally twisting the essence of the denuclearization issue on the Korean peninsula, and a ridiculous act of nuclear war criminals to cover up their true colors and force the DPRK to scrap its nuclear program.
					
					 The denuclearization being called for by the DPRK is the denuclearization of the whole Korean peninsula and this includes the dismantlement of nukes in south Korea and its vicinity.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet forces have neither elementary qualifications nor face to talk about the "north's denuclearization" as they spawned and have complicated the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula, the statement said, disclosing how the U.S. and the puppet forces derailed the process for the denuclearization on the peninsula.
					
					 If the U.S. and the south Korean authorities have an iota of interest in the denuclearization on the Korean peninsula, they should accept the principled demand of the DPRK before anything else, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Firstly, all the nuclear weapons should be opened to public, first of all, which the U.S. has neither acknowledged nor denied after bringing them to south Korea.
					
					 Secondly, all the nukes and their bases should be dismantled and verified in the eyes of the world public.
					
					 Thirdly, the U.S. should ensure that it would never bring again the nuclear strike means to south Korea, which the U.S. has frequently deployed on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity.
					
					 Fourthly, it should commit itself to neither intimidating the DPRK with nukes or through an act of nuclear war nor using nukes against the DPRK in any case.
					
					 Fifthly, the withdrawal of the U.S. troops holding the right to use nukes from south Korea should be declared.
					
					 If the U.S. and the south Korean authorities truly want to see the denuclearization on the Korean peninsula and build a "peaceful world without nuclear weapons", there will be no reason for them to turn down the just demand of the DPRK.
					
					 If such security guarantee comes true, the DPRK will also take steps in response to it and a decisive breakthrough will be made in realizing the denuclearization on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Taking this opportunity, the DPRK warns Park Geun Hye and other south Korean authorities not to play trickery any more to seek loopholes crying out for "denuclearization of the north" in collusion with their master but face up to the present reality.
					
					 If they desperately defy the principled demand of the DPRK, the latter's nukes will be further bolstered up both in quality and quantity and its capacity will reach its maximum. They should bear this in mind.
					
					 The denuclearization on the Korean peninsula entirely hinges on the attitude and behavior of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Vietnamese President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Vietnamese President
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Tran Dai Quang, president of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, on Monday.
					 The message extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un upon his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK at the Fourth Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					
					 The message expressed conviction that the government and people of the DPRK would register bigger success in their efforts to accomplish the cause of building a prosperous state for the Korean people's happiness under his leadership.
					
					 It hoped that the traditional friendly relations between Vietnam and the DPRK would grow stronger.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and bigger success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Condolences to Bangladeshi PM
articles.content:
Condolences to Bangladeshi PM
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju on July 5 sent a message of sympathy to Prime Minister of Bangladesh Sheikh Hasina as regards the terrorist attack in Bangladesh that caused casualties.
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and condolences for the victims and bereaved families, and hoped that the Bangladeshi government would overcome the aftermath of the tragic disaster and achieve social stability at an early date. It reaffirmed the consistent stand of the government of the DPRK to oppose all forms of terrorism.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a message of sympathy to his Bangladeshi counterpart Abul Hassan Mahmood Ali on the same day.

articles.title: Congratulations to FM of Philippines
articles.content:
Congratulations to FM of Philippines
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a congratulatory message to Perfecto Yasay upon his appointment as foreign minister of Philippines, on July 2.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in various fields in the future and wished him success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Congratulations to FM of Qatar
articles.content:
Congratulations to FM of Qatar
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Sultan bin Saad bin Sultan Al-Muraikhi upon his appointment as foreign minister of Qatar.
					 The message expressed belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger thanks to the mutual cooperation between the two foreign ministries and wished him success in his new job.

articles.title: U.S. Is to Blame for Disrupting Excavation of Remains of GIs
articles.content:
U.S. Is to Blame for Disrupting Excavation of Remains of GIs
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Nam Hyok, researcher at the Institute for American Studies of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK, issued the following commentary on Wednesday:
					 Voices calling for the resumption of the excavation of remains of GIs in the territory of the DPRK that had been suspended are being heard from within the U.S. recently.
					
					 Bill Richardson, former governor of New Mexico State, the chairman of the Coalition of Families of Korean & Cold War POW/MIAs, and others at a seminar at George Washington University in the U.S. on June 23 reportedly asked the U.S. government to pay heed to the resumption of the excavation of remains of GIs, saying that "the lifetime hope for thousands of Americans is to bring home their loved one still missing in North Korea. It is a wound that never healed. The path to finding that closure will open only when North Korean and U.S. leaders decide to pursue this humanitarian mission other than their political differences."
					
					 On the 66th anniversary of the outbreak of the Korean War on June 24, three members of the House of Representatives of U.S. Congress who are Korean War veterans submitted to the House of Representatives a resolution in their joint name demanding the U.S. government immediately come out for talk with North Korea to confirm the identities of GIs who died or remain unaccounted for during the Korean War and to bring back their remains.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that incumbent lawmakers and NGOs in the U.S. are taking the administration to the task for the resumption of the recovery mission.
					
					 By origin, the excavation of remains of GIs within the territory of the DPRK was started as a humanitarian measure taken by the DPRK at repeated earnest request made by the U.S. administration, the Korean War veterans and bereaved families to finally settle the issue of the identification of missing and unaccounted Korean War veterans.
					
					 At that time it was a thing totally beyond imagination to excavate and send the remains of U.S. imperialist aggressors who inflicted unspeakable misfortune and pain on the Korean people in the past Fatherland Liberation War and, furthermore, it was a thing that could not be allowed for soldiers of hostile country to go about in the territory of the DPRK.
					
					 But the army and people of the DPRK, taking into consideration the ardent desire of bereaved families to have even the remains of their kinsmen who met deaths in the Korean War be buried in their native places, rendered cooperation for the smooth excavation on more than 30 occasions for nearly ten years since 1996, with magnanimity from humanitarian stand, though the DPRK-U.S. relations were acute.
					
					 Members from the U.S. side who had taken part in the joint excavation repeatedly expressed gratitude for the humanitarian measure and active cooperation rendered by the DPRK.
					
					 However, afterwards the U.S. totally denied the sincere efforts made by the DPRK and the minds of bereaved families of those who took part in the war and unilaterally suspended the excavation work under the pretext of "threat to security" and went so impudent as to abuse such humanitarian issues as the excavation of remains for meeting Washington's political purpose on several occasions and tried to shift the blame for the suspension of the excavation work on to the DPRK. 
					
					 In September 2014 the then U.S. Defense Secretary Hagel made groundless assertion at a memorial ceremony for the "day of POWs and missing persons" that "the resumption of the excavation of remains depends on North Korea's implementation of the resolutions of UN Security Council" even though he said "it is the firm stand of the government never to forget missing GIs, find out them to the last man and let them come to the fold of their families". Military authorities including a spokesperson for the Defense Department maintained that the "North Korean government's provocative act is the reason for the suspension of the excavation of remains".
					
					 Even at this moment the U.S. administration is making sophism that the resumption is only possible when North Korea stops provocation and shows its will to follow through on the UN Security Council's resolutions and there is ensuing improvement in the bilateral relations, while shelving Washington's responsibility for disrupting the excavation.
					
					 It is natural that Americans can not favor the attitude of the administration which always finds fault with others while abusing even humanitarian issue for meeting its political purposes, being obsessed by inveterate repugnance and hostility toward the DPRK.
					
					 We do not care whether the U.S., a party directly concerned with the excavation work of remains of GIs who had become forlorn wandering spirit, is interested in the resumption of the excavation or not.
					
					 The U.S. is mistaken if it thinks it can resume the excavation work at its will now as it suspended the work unilaterally.
					
					 With no sleight of hand can the U.S. evade from the responsibility for disrupting such humanitarian work as the excavation of remains of GIs, while pursuing its hideous hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. Should Make Serious Choice: Spokesman for Institute for American Studies of DPRK Foreign Ministry
articles.content:
U.S. Should Make Serious Choice: Spokesman for Institute for American Studies of DPRK Foreign Ministry
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Institute for American Studies of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer on Wednesday to the question raised by KCNA as regards the claim being floated in the U.S. that "third offset strategy" should be applied to the Korean peninsula:
					 Former officials and experts on East Asian affairs of the U.S. at a recent seminar held at Georgetown University reportedly asserted that "third offset strategy" should be applied to the Korean peninsula as muscle-flexing like joint military drills and introduction of strategic bombers can not thwart the "nuclear and missile threat" coming from the DPRK.
					
					 The "third offset strategy" advanced by the U.S. military in 2014 calls for modernizing weaponry to the maximum and increasing the cyber and electronic warfare capability by introducing ultra-modern military technology and thus rounding off a combined operational commanding system to cope with the moves being stepped up by other big powers to develop their ultra-modern weapons.
					
					 The above-said claim is a manifestation of the extreme hostile moves of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK by mobilizing not only conventional and nuclear forces but also ultra-modern war hardware, and a revelation of its ill-minded purpose to get undisguised in its moves to maintain its military edge in Northeast Asia under the pretext of the "threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is fully capable of making any strategy of the U.S. go belly-up determinedly, to say nothing of the "third offset strategy." 
					
					 The U.S. is crying out for countering the "nuclear and missile threat" from the DPRK but it is just the U.S. which has escalated the danger of war through ceaseless arms buildup and war drills on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity.
					
					 If the U.S. does not want to meet its miserable end in the all-out confrontation with the DPRK, it should make a serious choice, clearly understanding the latter's strategic position and facing up to the change of the times.

articles.title: Manager of DPRK Mudubong Shipping Co. Ltd. Issues Statement on Ship Mudubong
articles.content:
Manager of DPRK Mudubong Shipping Co. Ltd. Issues Statement on Ship Mudubong
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The manager of the Mudubong Shipping Co. Ltd. of the DPRK made public the following statement Wednesday.
					 A decision of the Ministry of Transport of Mexico on scrapping and disposing the DPRK's trading ship Mudubong was recently reported by the Mexican government newspaper, according to information from a relevant institution. 
					
					 The following is the stand of the ship-owner Mudubong Shipping Co. Ltd. in this regard:
					
					 The ship had been impounded in Tuxpan Port of Mexico since January last year due to the unreasonable decision that it was "subject to freeze of properties" for being owned and controlled by the Ocean Maritime Management Co. Ltd. on the list of the UN Security Council "sanctions".
					
					 We already clarified several times by citing concrete facts that the ship can never be put on the list of "sanctions" and "property freeze" as it is the legitimate property of our company. But the 1718 Committee of the UNSC repeatedly requested the Mexican government not to allow the departure of the ship, asserting it is on the list of "sanctions", and this led to the scrapping of the ship in the end. The only "reason" for holding the ship was "resolutions" of the UN Security Council which are in violation of the spirit and requirements of the UN Charter and relevant conventions and which are unreasonable as they lack any legal ground.
					
					 Our company, therefore, vehemently denounces the long-term impounding of the civilian ship as a wanton encroachment upon our legitimate right to own the ship, while considering all the ensuing losses and damage as the product of the U.S.-led hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 All members and sailors of our company who had been engaged in peaceable and legitimate non-governmental business activities have suffered untold spiritual and socio-economic losses due to the illegal "sanctions resolutions" of the UNSC and the unreasonable holding of the ship, pursuant to them and this has done great harm to the living of individual families.
					
					 All this clearly proves the hypocrisy and double-dealing attitude of the U.S. and its followers crying out for defending "human rights".
					
					 We solemnly declare that we will certainly have all spiritual and material losses and damages inflicted upon us by unreasonable U.S.-manipulated UN "resolutions" paid and have the right to claim indemnity generation after generation.

articles.title: Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here upon his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 They were handed to DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Wednesday by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK who is doyen of the diplomatic corps.
					
					 Earlier, Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, and floral baskets from Vietnamese Ambassador Pham Viet Hung and the Cambodian Embassy.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors corps here visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Wednesday on the 22nd anniversary of demise of the President.
					 They laid a floral basket before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Chief of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Chief of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung is a pioneer and leader of the cause of national reunification just as he is praised by all Koreans.
					 Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF), said this when interviewed by KCNA on Wednesday.
					
					 The chief said that every chronicle of the Korean nation's reunification movement was recorded with the devoted efforts of the President who led the cause of national independence to victory with his profound idea, outstanding leadership and great magnanimity.
					
					 The chief went on:
					
					 The President actively tided over all difficulties and hurdles, indicated the fundamental principles and measures for reunification and led all Koreans to implement them.
					
					 The three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo, which serve as the guidelines in carrying out the cause of national reunification, reflected the President's ardent love for the country and nation and unbreakable will for reunification.
					
					 We cannot fathom how many sleepless nights the President spent, how long road he took and how many works he authored for opening up a turning phase for reunification.
					
					 As he regarded the reunification of the country as his noble mission and the greatest gift to be presented to the Koreans, he stayed up the whole night to leave on the document related to national reunification his immortal and historic autograph even in the last moments of his great life.
					
					 Nine autographic letters reading "Kim Il Sung 1994.7.7." reflect the tireless efforts and wisdom of the peerlessly great man who did his best for national reunification and provided firm groundwork for independent reunification and his earnest request on achieving national reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, by the concerted efforts of all Koreans.
					
					 Indeed, the world history records no man as great as the President who devoted his all to the country and the nation till the last moments of his life.

articles.title: International Kim Il Sung Prize Conferred on Russian
articles.content:
International Kim Il Sung Prize Conferred on Russian
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The International Kim Il Sung Prize Council in April decided to award the prize to Alexandr Andreyevich Prokhanov, editor-in-chief of the Russian newspaper Zavtra, for his tangible contribution to the building of powerful Russia, the cause of global independence and peace, friendship, unity, progress and prosperity among countries through his eminent writing activities.

articles.title: Young Vanguard Renew Their Pledge
articles.content:
Young Vanguard Renew Their Pledge
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- There took place an oath-taking meeting of the young vanguard in front of the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Wednesday on the 22nd anniversary of demise of the President.
					 Present at the meeting were Choe Ryong Hae, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, youth league officials, youths and students.
					
					 Prior to the meeting the participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, made a report which was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said the President embarked upon the road of the revolution in his early years and fathered the immortal Juche idea and saved the country and the nation from the Japanese imperialists. The President defeated the two formidable imperialist enemies in one generation, successfully led the two-stage social revolution and built a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence on this land, they said, and went on:
					
					 The President put forward the idea of attaching importance to the youth and deeply loved and trusted in the youth during the whole period of his leadership over the revolution, providing the great unit of successors to the Korean revolution and opening a new history of the Juche-oriented youth movement.
					
					 The ideas and wishes of the great leaders are being successfully realized on this land as the DPRK is holding in high esteem Marshal Kim Jong Un at the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state.
					
					 The reporter and speakers called upon all the youth league officials and other young people to uphold the great leaders as the eternal sun of Juche and carry forward the cause of the Juche revolution that started in Mt. Paektu down through generations under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers and Members of UAWK Meet
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers and Members of UAWK Meet
Hamju, July 6 (KCNA) -- An oath-taking meeting of agricultural workers and members of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) took place at the Tongbong Co-op Farm in Hamju County on Wednesday on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					Present there were officials concerned and agricultural workers and members of the union in the county.
					
					Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the UAWK, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					The reporter and speakers said that the whole life of the President was the brilliant one of the most outstanding leader and peerlessly great man who dedicated his all to the country, the people and the cause of global independence.
					
					The drastic change in socialist rural areas and epochal change in carving out the destiny of agricultural workers of the DPRK are the brilliant fruition of ardent patriotism of the President and his warm loving care for the people and his devoted efforts, they noted, and went on:
					
					The cause of the Juche revolution that started and was led to victory by the President and leader Kim Jong Il is being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					The reporter and speakers pledged to unconditionally carry out the last instructions of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il without an inch of deflection to give steady continuity to their sacred revolutionary history.
					
					They said that they would firmly arm themselves with great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and create legendary tales about heroism in the new Mallima era one after another, pursuant to the long-term strategy and along the path indicated by Kim Jong Un in his report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the work of the Central Committee.

articles.title: New Symphonies Created
articles.content:
New Symphonies Created
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The National Symphony Orchestra of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea created new symphonies reflecting the sentiment of citizens.
					 Among them are orchestral overture "Mother's Birthday", symphonic series "We Sing of the Party" and orchestral music "Snowstorm of Mt. Paektu", "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu", "Green Pine on Nam Hill" and "Appearance of Korea".
					
					 Those orchestral works successfully represent the spirit of the DPRK army and people always picturing Mt. Paektu, the ancestral mountain of the country, and the revolutionary optimism that one can surely emerge victorious when overcoming all sorts of difficulties and ordeals in the spirit of uninterrupted revolution.
					
					 And "Appearance of Korea" shows well that the single-hearted unity of the DPRK people rallied around the leader with unique idea and will is the most powerful might superior to any nuclear weapons.
					
					 Meanwhile, the National Symphony Orchestra made such achievements as recreating various works like chorus and orchestra "A Bumper Harvest in the Chongsan Plain", piano concerto "To a Decisive Battle" and cantata "The Amnok River".

articles.title: Field Medical Service Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Field Medical Service Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Medical institutions at all levels in the DPRK have rendered field medical services at co-op farms.
					 Medical workers of Kangwon Provincial People's Hospital have checked up on the health of farmers and their families and give medical treatment on the spot.
					
					 Those from Panmunjom-ri and Phyonghwa-ri people's hospitals of Kaesong City conduct hygienic agitation activities and render medical services in the field, thus contributing to boosting agricultural production.
					
					 Hygienic and anti-epidemic workers of Unsan County, North Phyongan Province strive to prevent seasonal infectious diseases.
					
					 Similar activities have been carried out in South Hwanghae, South Phyongan, and North and South Hamgyong provinces to inspire farmers to increase production.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Peerless Elder Statesman
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Peerless Elder Statesman
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was an outstanding leader and peerless elder statesman who glorified the 20th century as the one of independence.
					 He created the immortal Juche idea to usher in the era of independence, which was highly praised as a great event, distinguished services.
					
					 With steadfast faith and will of Juche and ardent patriotism, Kim Il Sung had successfully applied the Juche idea in the revolution and construction, thus setting an example of independent politics.
					
					 In the whole period of leading the revolution, he had always maintained the principle of independent politics and firmly defended the interests of the revolution, leading the trend of the 20th century to the path of independence.
					
					 He made a great contribution to realizing the cause of global independence by authoring many famous works. And he met more than 70 000 foreigners, including over 400 party leaders and heads of state and government from 136 countries, and gave them important teachings.
					
					 Therefore, it is not without reason that Fidel Castro Ruz, ex-president of the Council of State of Cuba, Francois Mitterrand, ex-president of France, Sin Kanemaru, ex-vice president of the Liberal Democratic Party of Japan, and Jimmy Carter, ex-U.S. president, spoke highly of Kim Il Sung as "the most experienced and prestigious man", "the greatest man", "the great politician" and "the great sun god of human destiny."
					
					 In his lifetime, Kim Il Sung was awarded the highest orders and medals, honorary citizenship, honorary professorship and doctorate of many countries and international bodies.
					
					 Over 165 900 pieces of gifts were presented to him by party leaders, heads of state and government and progressive peoples from 169 countries as well as overseas Koreans and south Korean people.
					
					 And the number of orders and medals, honorary titles and gifts is on a steady increase by the world progressives.
					
					 Immortal flower Kimilsungia is being cultivated and colorful events are taking place one after another to praise him across the world.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Brands S. Korean Authorities as Arch Criminals Driving Inter-Korean Ties into Catastrophe
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Brands S. Korean Authorities as Arch Criminals Driving Inter-Korean Ties into Catastrophe
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean chief executive hurled a stream of abuses at a recent opening session of the 20th "National Assembly," blustering that "the north's nuclear development is blocking the improvement of the south-north relations" and that "the dialogue proposal without denuclearization is the one for bringing about a change in the phase."
					 She, in a video message to "the Advisory Council for Democracy and Peaceful Unification", incited the confrontation by crying out for "a perfect posture", describing the DPRK's nuclear deterrent as a "threat" to the north-south relations and peace.
					
					 Mandarins of the puppet Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Ministries of Unification and Defense also blustered that "the north's nuclear development is throwing a stumbling block in the way of the south-north relations and peace" and that "denuclearization is the top priority task for dialogue."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun on Wednesday observes in an article in this regard:
					
					 It is the height of impudence for the south Korean authorities to mislead the public opinion by creating the impression that the north-south ties have been driven into catastrophe owing to the DPRK's self-defensive measure for bolstering up nuclear deterrence.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are chiefly to blame for having pushed the inter-Korean ties to catastrophe under the pretext of nuclear issue though they had developed favorably.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. and south Korean authorities that spawned the nuclear issue and have increased the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 The puppet warmongers have persisted in their moves to unleash a nuclear war against the north in collusion with outsiders, terming the north's self-defensive nuclear deterrence a "threat." These war drumbeats are pushing the north-south ties to the point of explosion.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nukes is irrelevant to the catastrophe of the north-south relations at all.
					
					 The stumbling block lying in the way of improving the inter-Korean ties is not the DPRK's nuclear deterrent, but the anti-reunification moves stepped up by the south Korean authorities to bedevil the inter-Korean relations, pursuant to their policy for escalating the confrontation with the compatriots in the north.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye's Invectives against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye's Invectives against DPRK
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Days ago, Park Geun Hye invited riffs-raffs in south Korea and abroad styling themselves experts on "human rights issue in north Korea" to a meeting at Chongwadae at which she asked them to render "sustainable cooperation" in the smear campaign over "human rights issue in the north."
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says:
					
					 This clearly shows how desperately the south Korean puppet authorities are working to prevent the campaign for stifling the DPRK from losing steam and ratchet up "pressure on the north."
					
					 Park does not have even an iota of qualifications to talk about "human rights" as she has turned the whole of south Korea into a tundra of democracy and human rights by reviving the past "yusin" dictatorial system and its society into a horrible hell through corruption, incompetence and unpopular rule.
					
					 Nevertheless, sitting on the garbage heap she slandered the DPRK where the people enjoy all the benefits. This is nothing but a shameless act to cover up human rights abuses while trampling down democracy through fascist dictatorship and driving people's living into dire destitution by ruining economy and pursuing traitorous policies and calm down the angry people.
					
					 We remain unperturbed no matter what rhetoric the riffs-raffs may tweet and will go ahead along our own course.
					
					 We regard the vociferous invectives about "human rights in the north" reeled off by the south Korean puppet authorities as nothing but barking  of dogs, terrified by thunder.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Halt Its Nuclear Threat and Blackmail against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Halt Its Nuclear Threat and Blackmail against DPRK
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The nuclear threat and blackmail and sanctions escalated by the U.S. against the DPRK, failing to properly judge the fundamentally changed strategic position of Juche Korea and the trend of the times, would only prompt the latter to bolster up its nuclear attack means, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary.
					 The DPRK's successful test-fire of strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-10 sends a strong message to the world, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The strategic structure of standoff between the DPRK and the U.S. and the trend of the situation have dramatically changed.
					
					 In the last period, there existed only the unilateral nuclear threat and blackmail of the U.S. in the DPRK-U.S. relations. Consequently, extreme tension prevailed on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 But, the U.S. mainland is now exposed to threat.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists leveled the areas of the DPRK to the ground in the period of the Korean war, claiming that the latter would not be able to stand on its feet even in a hundred years. More than six decades since then the U.S. mainland may be reduced to debris.
					
					 Just as the U.S. has put staging madcap nuclear war drills by introducing nuclear strategic assets into south Korea on a "routine basis," the DPRK's efforts to bolster up its nuclear deterrence have become routine.
					
					 The DPRK's capability to make a preemptive nuclear attack will be further bolstered up in the future.
					
					 It is the U.S. and its followers who will suffer from extreme terror and horrible nightmare with the passage of time.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet group are trumpeting about "denuclearization" from an anachronistic viewpoint. But it is too late. It is hard to turn back the clock of history.

articles.title: Frauds and Swindle of Employees of "Aviation Company" Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Frauds and Swindle of Employees of "Aviation Company" Disclosed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Frauds and swindle of employees of the "Aviation Company" of south Korea were disclosed amid all sorts of crimes getting evermore rampant in south Korea, according to the south Korean MBC on July 3.
					 It was reported that agents in charge of handling of explosives in the airport embezzled funds after cooking up a false document on the explosives to be used for drills.
					
					 In particular, unverified facilities for dealing with explosives were installed in Kimhae, Kimpho, Jeju and other airports.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Urges Authorities to Accept DPRK's Proposal for Great National Conference
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Urges Authorities to Accept DPRK's Proposal for Great National Conference
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty in south Korea in a statement on July 4 urged the puppet authorities to accept the proposal of the DPRK to hold a great national conference for reunification. 
					 But the south Korean authorities turned down the offer, terming it   "offensive for the united front lacking sincerity", and insisted on their old stand that there is no dialogue before the "north's denuclearization," the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime should not reject the north's proposal under the pretext of the unrealistic "denuclearization first" but make positive efforts to create the atmosphere of improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving national reconciliation and unity.

articles.title: Suppression of KCTU Chairman Denounced
articles.content:
Suppression of KCTU Chairman Denounced
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea on July 4 made public a commentary in denunciation of the suppression of Han Sang Gyun, chairman of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU).
					 The commentary referred to the fact that the Seoul Central District Court sentenced Han Sang Gyun to 5 years in jail on charges that he instigated an illegal assembly.
					
					 The judicial authorities' sentence can not mar solidarity between workers and citizens, the commentary said, calling for rectifying the wrong sentence.
					
					 It noted that the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society would make positive efforts for ensuring freedom of assembly and demonstration and three labor rights through strong solidarity between workers and citizens.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Call for Successful Great National Conference for Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Call for Successful Great National Conference for Reunification
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. in a statement on Monday, the 44th anniversary of publication of the historic July 4 joint statement called for ushering in a new era of independent reunification and national prosperity by the concerted efforts of all Koreans.
					 Expectation for independent and peaceful reunification is growing stronger among 80 million Koreans upon receiving the proposal made at the joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations for opening a great national conference for reunification on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 This proposal helps pave the road of again ushering in the era of concord and exchange, not confrontation and antagonism between the north and the south.
					
					 The spirit of the joint statement is fully reflected in the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The way of inheriting this spirit is to actively respond to the above-said proposal of the joint conference.
					
					 The statement called for successfully opening the great national conference for reunification and thus ushering in a new era of reunification and prosperity.

articles.title: DPRK Is Further Bolstering up Its Nuclear Deterrent for Self-Defence: Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK Is Further Bolstering up Its Nuclear Deterrent for Self-Defence: Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on June 30 to denounce the U.S. for creating the climate of the international pressure against the DPRK, while finding fault with its measure for bolstering up its self-defensive capabilities.
					 The statement said that a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry issued a statement to accuse the U.S. of terming the DPRK's test-fire of surface-to-surface medium long-range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-10 the so-called "provocation" and "threat".
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Self-defence is neither provocation nor threat.
					
					 On the contrary, it is, indeed, the grave provocations threatening the DPRK's security and sovereignty for the U.S. to ceaselessly stage nuclear war drills such as the "beheading operation" and "operation for occupying Pyongyang" aimed at the supreme leadership of the DPRK by introducing its many strategic assets such as nuclear-powered submarine Mississippi and B-52H strategic bombers into south Korea and its vicinity.
					
					 It is preposterous for the U.S. to talk about the so-called issue of dialogue.
					
					 The DPRK is further bolstering up its nuclear deterrent for self-defence.
					
					 This is just and legitimate.

articles.title: British Body Censures S. Korean Regime's Confrontational Moves
articles.content:
British Body Censures S. Korean Regime's Confrontational Moves
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its website on June 12 an article censuring the south Korean regime's draconic confrontational racket against the DPRK.
					 The article noted that all Koreans ardently hope for the repair of the north-south relations that plunged into nadir, recollecting with deep emotion the day 16 years ago when the historic June 15 joint declaration was adopted.
					
					 Blaming the south Korean authorities for getting frantic in their confrontational racket against the DPRK, quite contrary to its sincere efforts for mending the north-south relations and the requirements of all Koreans, the article went on:
					
					 The reality shows that the south Korean authorities are desperately moving to stifle the DPRK by force, chilling the patriotic efforts exerted by the DPRK for dialogue and improvement of the north-south relations.
					
					 The article urged the south Korean authorities to take the road of mending their relations with the north, though belatedly, bearing in mind that the more desperate fascist suppression of the pro-reunification patriotic forces and reckless military provocations against the trend of the times for the improvement of the north-south relations will only trigger off stronger resentment of the public and that they will never be able to escape stern punishment by the nation.

articles.title: June 25-July 27 Month of Anti-U.S. Joint Struggle Observed Abroad
articles.content:
June 25-July 27 Month of Anti-U.S. Joint Struggle Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Events in various countries observed the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 There took place a book and photo exhibition in Nigeria and film shows in Sweden and Singapore on June 23 and 24.
					
					 On display at the venue of the exhibition were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were books and photos introducing the struggle of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Such Korean "Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum" and "Who Drew the 38th Parallel" were shown.
					
					 The chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea disclosed the true colors of the U.S. as chief architect of Korea's division and provoker of the Korean war and detailed its inhumane crimes, saying that the U.S. is the sworn enemy of the Korean people as it has inflicted untold misfortune and pain upon them.

articles.title: Bulgarian Organization Praises of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Bulgarian Organization Praises of Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association issued the July issue of its bulletin.
					 The bulletin said in an article titled "The 22nd anniversary of demise of the great leader":
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung who embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army, waged the 15-year-long bloody anti-Japanese armed struggle and thus liberated Korea on Aug. 15, 1945.
					
					 He accomplished the cause of building the party, army and state and enforced the overall democratic reforms after the liberation of Korea. He also led the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War to victory and developed the DPRK into an advanced socialist industrial state.
					
					 Though many years have passed since he passed away, the Korean people are holding him in high esteem as their eternal leader and calling their country and nation Kim Il Sung's Korea and Kim Il Sung's nation.
					
					 His brilliant career and exploits will be immortal along with humankind like the sun.
					
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Day of victory" praised Kim Il Sung for resolutely smashing the U.S. imperialists' invasion and firmly defending the country's dignity and sovereignty.
					
					 It carried an article titled "Month of solidarity with the Korean people".

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of Russia for Remembering Comrade Kim Il Sung was formed on July 1.
					 Dolgachev, first secretary of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events to remember the revolutionary career and exploits of President Kim Il Sung on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Finland
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Finland
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Helsinki, Finland on June 30.
					 Juha Kieksy, chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea who doubles as international secretary of the Finnish Communists' League, and Pekka Kotkasaari, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, were elected co-chairpersons of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in DR Congo
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- A committee of DR Congo for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Kinshasa on July 2.
					 Andre Lohekele Kalonda, chairman of the DR Congo National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to significantly organize a remembrance meeting, seminar, photo exhibition, film show and other events on the 22nd anniversary of demise of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered by Regional Body
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered by Regional Body
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed by the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions on July 3.
					 Mikhail Panchenko, general secretary of the alliance, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to significantly organize meetings, lectures and other political and cultural events on the 22nd anniversary of demise of the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Thailand
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Thailand
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- A Thai committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed on June 28.
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold a meeting, photo exhibition, film show and other political and cultural events on the 22nd anniversary of demise of the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Indonesia
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- An Indonesian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed on June 28.
					 Ristiyanto, general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee set the remembrance period from June 28 to July 10 and decided to hold political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Syria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Syria
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- A committee of the Socialist Unionist Party of Syria for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed on July 3.
					 Adnan Ismail, general secretary of the party, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the career and exploits of the President through the party organ and to organize political and cultural events on the 22nd anniversary of demise of the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered by Romanian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered by Romanian Political Party
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- A Romanian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed by the New Socialist Party of Romania on June 28.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the party, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee set the remembrance period from July 1 to 10 and decided to hold a seminar, lecture, photo exhibition and other political and cultural events.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Romania
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Romania
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- A Romanian national committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed by the Socialist Party of Romania on June 30.
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the party, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee set the remembrance period from July 1 to 8 and decided to organize a memorial meeting, lecture, book and photo exhibition, film show and other political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in France
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in France
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in France on June 24.
					 Guy Dupre, president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary exploits of Kim Il Sung and organize various events on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Different Countries
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Lectures and film shows took place in Guinea and Nigeria between June 27 and 29 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 "Flag of the Workers' Party of Korea", "Mirae Scientists Street" and other Korean films were shown.
					
					 The battalion commander of a commando of the Defense Ministry of Guinea said in his lecture that President Kim Il Sung was a benevolent father of all people, adding:
					
					 Everyone who met the President was enchanted by his great personality.
					
					 Though he passed away, his august name has been cherished in the minds of the world people.
					
					 Personages of a hospital in Nigeria said that the world progressive people are praising Kim Il Sung as the sun. 
					
					 They noted that he clearly indicated the road to be followed by humankind just like the sun. They went on:
					
					 The working people, who were pushed to the fringes of history and became subject to exploitation and oppression in the past, emerged as masters of history thanks to the Juche idea founded by him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Germany
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Make Our Country, Our Motherland, Ever More Prosperous, True to the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Intention" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house in Berlin.
					 The work published on Dec. 31, Juche 83 (1994) indicates the tasks and ways for making the DPRK more prosperous.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on June 30.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Planta de Tortugas de Agua Dulce de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Planta de Tortugas de Agua Dulce de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 6 de julio (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Planta de Tortugas de Agua Dulce de Pyongyang, convertida en un modelo estandarizado de las plantas de cria de nuestro pais. 
					Contemplando con amplia sonrisa el panorama de la planta,  el Presidente dijo que ella quedo remodelada maravillosamente durante un ano y expreso gran alegria diciendo que se haya preparado otra riqueza que hara aporte a la mejora de vida alimentaria del pueblo. 
					
					Tras observar el mural mosaico que describe la imagen del Dirigente Kim Jong Il  recien levantado en el recinto de la planta, el Presidente recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria nuevamente acondicionada. 
					
					Senalo que el EPC haya construido bien esa sala y destaco la necesidad de organizar con escrupulosidad la educacion para inculcar profundamente en el corazon de los empleados las hazanas de orientacion del Dirigente y el partido impregnadas en la fabrica.
					
					Pasando revista a la sala de control integral, el criadero de tortugas de agua dulce bajo techo, la sala de incubacion, la sala de maquinas geotermicas, la sala de cultivo de microorganismos y otros puntos de la planta, averiguo en detalles del estado de reconstruccion y produccion. 
					
					Subrayo que para realizar en el nivel elevado la cientifizacion e informatizacion de la cria de tortugas de agua dulce se haya instalado excelentemente el sistema de produccion integrada capaz de controlar en tiempo real la temperatura de agua de los criaderos, la cantidad contenida de oxigeno, pH y el tiempo de alimentacion hasta varios metodos de produccion y plan. 
					
					Continuo que la planta se ha convertido en la de ahorro de energia y agua al tomar estrictamente las medidas de mantenimiento de calor de los criaderos y el aseguramiento de calor segun la geotermia y establecer el proceso de reciclaje de agua segun la filtracion biologica para aprovechar otra vez el agua usado en la cria.
					
					Instruyo normalizar en nivel elevado la produccion ya que la planta se reconstruyo modernamente de acuerdo con el proposito del partido. Y presento las tareas que le incumben. 
					
					Recalco que la planta se quedo modificada excelentemente y evaluo altamente las proezas de los funcionarios, constructores militares, cientificos y tecnicos quienes dedicaron toda su inteligencia creativa, pasion, abnegacion y los esfuerzos a la reconstruccion.
					
					Kim Jong Un tomo fotos de recuerdo junto con los funcionarios y empleados de la planta.
					
					Le acompanaron Jo Yong Won y Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: Vocero del gobierno de RPDC condena la sofisteria de "desnuclearizacion del Norte"
articles.content:
Vocero del gobierno de RPDC condena la sofisteria de "desnuclearizacion del Norte"
Pyongyang, 6 de julio (ACNC) -- En el Septimo Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea aclararon la posicion politica de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de dedicar ingentes esfuerzos para acabar con el origen del peligro de la guerra nuclear que se impone por Estados Unidos, apoyandose en nuestra potente capacidad de disuasion nuclear, y para preservar de esta manera la paz de nuestra region y el resto del mundo, y de no ser la primera en usarlas mientras las fuerzas agresivas hostiles no violen su soberania con ese medio, cumplir con honestidad el deber de la no proliferacion nuclear asumido ante la comunidad internacional y empenarse en desnuclearizar el mundo.
					Ya la RPDC entro en el trabajo de nueva etapa para su implementacion. 
					
					Pero, EE.UU., las autoridades surcoreanas y otras fuerzas hostiles anti-RPDC ensucian las opiniones internas y externas soltando con teson las sofisterias de que las armas nucleares de la RPDC devienen la "amenaza" a la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo y ningun problema sera solucionado antes de que se anteponga la "desnuclearizacion del Norte". 
					
					Ese imperio niega con la absurda condicion premisa de la llamada "renuncia nuclear de Norte, primero" la propuesta constructiva de la RPDC de cambiar el Acuerdo de Armisticio entre la RPDC y EE.UU. por el convenio de paz. Y desafia frontalmente con la insistencia de la "desnuclearizacion del Norte, primero" a las sinceras propuestas y los esfuerzos de dialogo de la RPDC destinados a la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas y la reintegracion de la patria. 
					
					Particularmente, la horda de Park Geun-hye vagabundea por todas partes del mundo mendigando el respaldo para la "renuncia de armas nucleares de la RPDC en primero". Y aprovecha de todas las ocasiones para pedir la cooperacion en la sancion y presion contra la RPDC.
					
					En su declaracion publicada hoy, el vocero del gobierno de la RPDC condena que tales hechos devienen un proceder estupido que tergiverso completamente la esencia del asunto de la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana, y una imprudencia absurda de los criminales nucleares tendentes a encubrir su naturaleza e imponer a la RPDC la renuncia de armas nucleares.    
					
					La desnuclearizacion en que insistimos es la de toda la extension de la Peninsula Coreana y en ella se incluyen la "cancelacion nuclear en el Sur de Corea" y la desnuclearizacion de los contornos del suelo surcoreano.
					
					EE.UU. y los compinches titeres surcoreanos, responsables que produjeron y agravaron el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana, no tienen la calidad elemental de hablar de la supuesta "desnuclearizacion del Norte", senala la nota.
					
					Y revela los crimenes de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea que llevaron al fracaso el proceso de desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y continuo:
					
					Si EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas tienen un minimo interes en la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula coreana, deben aceptar primero nuestra demanda de principios siguientes:
					
					Primero, hay que dar a la publicidad todos los armamentos nucleares norteamericanos que no reconocen ni niegan tras introducirlos en el suelo surcoreano. 
					
					Segundo, deben abolir todas las armas nucleares y sus bases en el territorio surcoreano y recibir la verificacion del mundo.
					
					Tercero, tienen que dar la garantia de que no volveran a introducir los medios de ataque nuclear que EE.UU. despliega con frecuencia en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno. 
					
					Cuarto, hay que prometer firmemente el que en cualquier caso no amenazaran a la RPDC con las armas nucleares y los actos belicos en que se movilicen los pertrechos nucleares ni emplearan las armas nucleares contra la ella. 
					
					Quinto, deben declarar la retirada de tropas yanquis que toman el derecho a uso de armas nucleares en el suelo surcoreano. 
					
					Si EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea aspiran de veras la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana, "el mundo libre de armas nucleares" y el "mundo pacifico", no tendran ninguna razon de no aceptar esas demandas justas nuestras.
					
					Si se logran realmente tales garantias de seguridad, tomaremos las medidas correspondientes y asi se preparara una brecha trascendental en el logro de desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Aprovechando esta ocasion, aconsejamos a Park y otras autoridades surcoreanas a no hacer mas artimanas para buscar su salida de la crisis en la absurda insistencia "desnuclearizacion del Norte" en connivencia con su amo gringo al ver correctamente la realidad creada ante ellas mismas. 
					
					Tienen que darse clara cuenta de que si siguen dando vista gorda a estas demandas de principio nuestras se intensificaran mas en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo nuestras armas nucleares y su poderio llegara a la cimera inimaginable a medida que pasa el tiempo. 
					
					La desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana depende totalmente del proceder de EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas.

articles.title: EE.UU. es responsable de destruccion de excavacion de restos mortales de tropas norteamericanas
articles.content:
EE.UU. es responsable de destruccion de excavacion de restos mortales de tropas norteamericanas
Pyongyang, 6 de julio (ACNC) -- Kim Nam Hyok, investigador del Instituto para Asuntos Norteamericanos del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, hizo publica el dia 6 un comentario siguiente:
					En estos dias, se escuchan en el suelo norteamericano las voces que demandan la reanudacion de la excavacion de los restos mortales de uniformados norteamericanos caidos, trabajo interrumpido en el suelo de la RPDC. 
					
					En un seminario sostenido el 23 de junio en la Universidad George Washington de Estados Unidos, Bill Richardson, ex gobernador de New Mexico, el presidente de la coalicion de familiares de prisioneros y desaparecidos del tiempo de la guerra coreana y la fria, etc. dijeron que la excavacion de los restos mortales de uniformados norteamericanos puede cumplir un rol importante en la mejora de relaciones EE.UU.-RPDC, deviene una herida no cicatrizada el que no trajeron los restos mortales de miles de militares desaparecidos en Norte de Corea durante la pasada guerra coreana (1950-1953) y puede ser un remedio bueno la realizacion de la excavacion por los organos civiles en vez de los organos gubernamentales. Y exigieron al gobierno prestar una atencion activa a la reanudacion del trabajo en cuestion dejando atras las diferencias politicas con el Norte de Corea.
					
					Por otra parte, con motivo del 66o aniversario del estallido de la guerra coreana los 3 miembros de la camara de representantes norteamericana quienes habian participado en la pasada guerra coreana, presentaron el dia 24 en nombre comun a la Camara de Representantes una resolucion demandando al gobierno estadounidense dar inicio pronto al dialogo con el Norte de Corea para confirmar la identidad de los soldados norteamericanos muertos o desparecidos en esa contienda y recuperar sus restos mortales. 
					
					No es causal el que los parlamentarios en activo y las entidades civiles de EE.UU. exigen a su administracion la responsabilidad relacionada con el problema de la reanudacion de excavacion de los restos mortales de sus militares. 
					
					Originalmente, el trabajo de desenterrar los restos mortales norteamericanos en el territorio de la RPDC fue la labor comenzada por las medidas humanitarias de la RPDC que acepto la repetida y ardiente peticion de la administracion norteamericana, los participantes en la guerra coreana y los familiares de los soldados muertos de solucionar definitivamente el problema de los desparecidos uniformados norteamericanos quienes perecieron en la pasada guerra coreana. 
					
					En aquel tiempo fue inimaginable el trabajo de desenterrar y devolver los restos mortales de los agresores yanquis que en el periodo de la pasada Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria dieron incontables desgracias y sufrimientos al pueblo coreano. En particular, fue intolerable la misma entrada de los militares del pais enemigo en el territorio de la RPDC. 
					
					Sin embargo, tomando en consideracion el ardiente deseo de familiares de buscar los restos mortales de sus consanguineos muertos en la guerra coreana y enterrarlos en sus tierras natales, el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos dispensaron una magnanimidad partiendo de la posicion humanitaria aun en medio de la tirantes relaciones entre la RPDC y EE.UU. de aquel entonces y brindaron una estrechada cooperacion para que se efectuaran sin dificultades las excavaciones en mas de 30 ocasiones durante casi 10 anos desde 1996.  
					
					Los miembros de la parte norteamericana, que habian participado en la obra de excavacion conjunta en aquel entonces, expresaron en reiteradas veces el agradecimiento por las medidas humanitarias y la cooperacion activa brindadas por la RPDC.
					
					A pesar de esto, EE.UU. interrumpio unilateralmente las labores de excavacion de restos mortales despreciando totalmente los esfuerzos sinceros de la RPDC y la aspiracion de los familiares de los participantes muertos en la guerra y pretextando alguna "amenaza de seguridad". Ademas, en varias ocasiones abuso cinicamente de los asuntos humanitarios como la excavacion de restos mortales en la realizacion de su objetivo politico, e intento imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad del cese del trabajo.
					
					En una actividad conmemorativa del "Dia de los presos y desaparecidos de guerra" realizada en septiembre de 2014, Hagel, ex secretario de Defensa, dijo que "es la firme posicion del gobierno no olvidar a los militares norteamericanos desaparecidos y buscarlos hasta el fin para devolverlos al regazo de sus familias" y peroro las absurdas insistencias en que el "reinicio de la excavacion de restos mortales depende de la ejecucion de la resolucion del Consejo de la Seguridad de la ONU por parte del Norte de Corea". Le sumaron el vocero del Departamento de Defensa y otras autoridades de la capa militar estadounidense senalando que "los actos provocativos del gobierno del Norte de Corea devienen el motivo de la paralisis de la excavacion de restos mortales".
					
					Hasta este momento, la administracion norteamericana, al dejar a un lado su responsabilidad de la ruptura del descubrimiento de restos mortales del ejercito norteamericano, pronuncia sofisterias de que podra reiniciar las labores de excavacion de restos mortales solo cuando el Norte de Corea muestre la voluntad de cesar las provocaciones y observar la resolucion arriba mencionada y se logre asi una mejora en las relaciones bilaterales.
					
					Por tanto, a los estadounidenses no les gustaria la actitud de su administracion que cautivada por el sentimiento negativo y hostil contra la RPDC, provoca siempre a la contraparte abusandose hasta de los asuntos humanitarios en el cumplimiento del objeto politico.
					
					La RPDC no hace caso a que EE.UU., dueno de restos mortales de militares norteamericanos, tenga interes o no en el reinicio de esas labores.
					
					Sera una gran equivocacion si EE.UU. piensa que podria reiniciar como quiera la excavacion de restos mortales interrumpida por el mismo.
					
					EE.UU. no podra liberarse con ninguna artimana de la responsabilidad de haber frustrado hasta las labores humanitarias como el descubrimiento de los restos mortales del ejercito norteamericano persiguiendo la peor politica hostil a la RPDC.

articles.title: Vocero de Instituto para Asuntos Norteamericanos de MINREX da respuesta a ACNC
articles.content:
Vocero de Instituto para Asuntos Norteamericanos de MINREX da respuesta a ACNC
Pyongyang, 6 de julio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de la ACNC formulada en relacion con que en los ultimos dias se escuchan en el suelo norteamericano las insistencias en que se necesita aplicar la llamada "tercera estrategia de compensacion" en la Peninsula Coreana, el vocero del Instituto para Asuntos Norteamericanos del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea respondio el dia 6 como lo siguiente:
					Segun trascendidos, los ex funcionarios y los especialistas en Asia Oriental de EE.UU., quienes tomaron parte en un seminario efectuado hace poco en la Universidad Georgetown, presentaron la insistencia en que hay que aplicar la "tercera estrategia de compensacion" porque la demostracion militar como los simulacros militares conjuntos y la introduccion de bombarderos estrategicos no podra prevenir la "amenaza de armas nucleares y misiles" de la RPDC.
					
					Esta estrategia, presentada en 2014 por la capa militar norteamericana, consiste en modernizar al maximo los armamentos e intensificar la capacidad de batallas ciberneticas y electronicas aplicando las tecnicas militares sofisticadas, asi como perfeccionar el sistema de mando operacional combinado conveniente para frente a otras potencias que aceleran el desarrollo de armas sofisticadas.
					
					El hecho de que se presenta la insistencia de aplicarle a la RPDC la estrategia en cuestion muestra las maniobras extremadamente hostiles tendentes a aplastar a la ella movilizando todo las armas convencionales, las nucleares y otros pertrechos sofisticados, y la ambicion de hacer mas abiertas las maquinaciones para mantener la hegemonia militar en la region de Noreste Asiatico pretextando la RPDC.
					
					Tenemos la suficiente capacidad y voluntad de hacer anicos a todos los inventos de EE.UU. incluyendo la "tercera estrategia de compensacion".
					
					EE.UU. suele decir que el se enfrenta con la "amenaza de armas nucleares y misiles de la RPDC". Pero, el es el responsable que acarrea el sustancial peligro de guerra mediante los incesantes incrementos de armas y entrenamientos en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno.
					
					Si EE.UU. no quiere la derrota tragica en la confrontacion total con la RPDC, debe hacer una seria opcion al ver correctamente la posicion estrategica de la RPDC y la epoca en cambio.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena a Park Geun-hye por su reiterada calumnia a la RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena a Park Geun-hye por su reiterada calumnia a la RPDC
Pyongyang, 6 de julio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, Park Geun-hye invito a Chongwadae a los autodenominados especialistas del Sur de Corea y de ultramar en el "problema de derechos humanos del Norte (de Corea)" y les pidio la "cooperacion sostenida" calumniando el supuesto "problema de DDHH del Norte".
					Este hecho deja conocer que la banda titere surcoreana esta desesperada para mantener el apagadizo ambiente de aplastamiento a la RPDC y reforzar la "presion sobre el Norte".
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual publicado este miercoles y prosigue:
					
					La gobernante surcoreana no tiene ni el minimo derecho a hablar de los "DDHH" de otro porque al rehabilitar la dictadura de Yusin (renovacion), convirtio todo el territorio surcoreano en la tierra privada de democracia y derechos humanos y toda la sociedad en el infierno practicando las politicas corruptas e impopulares.
					
					Sin embargo, se atreve a criticar a la RPDC, donde el pueblo vive felizmente, con el fin de calmar la indignada opinion publica al encubrir su crimen anti-DDHH de haber acabado con la democracia mediante la dictadura fascista y depauperado la vida del pueblo con la politica vendepatria.
					
					Sea como fuera la chismografia de los titeres surcoreanos, la RPDC avanzara a pasos firmes por el camino optado por si misma.
